content: कथ् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (कथयति-ते, कथित) {@--1@} To tell, relate, narrate, communicate (usually with <ab>dat.</ab> of person); राममिष्वसनदर्शनोत्सुकं मैथिलाय कथयांबभूव सः <ls>R. 11. 37.</ls> {@--2@} To declare, state, mention; <ls>Bg. 2. 34</ls>; <ls>R. 11. 15.</ls> {@--3@} To converse, talk with, hold conversation with; कथयित्वा सुमंत्रेण सह <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--4@} To indicate, betray, bespeak, show; <ls>V. 1. 6</ls>; <ls>Māl. 8. 10</ls>; आकारसदृशं चेष्टितमेवास्य कथयति <ls>Ś. 7.</ls> {@--5@} To describe, relate; किं कथ्यते श्रीरुभयस्य तस्य <ls>Ku. 7. 78</ls>; कथाच्छलेन बालानां नीतिस्तदिह कथ्यते <ls>H. Pr. 8</ls>; <ls>Pt. 4. 37.</ls> {@--6@} To inform, give information about, complain against; <ls>Mk. 3.</ls> {@--7@} To denounce. {@--8@} To suppose. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} (कथ्यते) {@--1@} To be called. {@--2@} To be regarded or considered as.
